title: GET_HELI_MAIN_ROTOR_DAMAGE_SCALE
content:
0xC37D668// GetHeliMainRotorDamageScale
float GET_HELI_MAIN_ROTOR_DAMAGE_SCALE(Vehicle heli);Parameters:heli: The helicopter to checkReturns: Returns a value representing the damage scaling factor applied to the helicopter's main rotor. The value ranges from 0.0 (no damage scaling) to1.0 (full damage scaling).
